answers.answer: I didn't do the 3 hour test, but was told to use my medicine (I was on Phenergan) 30 minutes before I did the test and it worked for me.

question: Has any one else had to take the 3 hour diabetes test and trown it up. This happened to me today 30 min into the test i threw all it up and now have to go back in mext monday and do it all again. My question is has anyones doctor giving them anything so they dont throw up. I dont wanna have to do this again.
title: any one else
